com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.util

类 UtcDateTypeAdapterUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.util.UtcDateTypeAdapterUtil

  • public final class UtcDateTypeAdapterUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an utility class for AylaTypeAdapterFactory class and is used by that class when the raw type is Date. The Date Type Adapter is needed to fix deserialization bug of date in the gson parser after switching mobile phone time preferences from 24 hour to 12 hour, Refer to known issue https://github.com/google/gson/issues/935

    • 方法详细资料

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.util.Date date,
                                      boolean millis,
                                      java.util.TimeZone tz)
        Format date into yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss[.sss][Z|[+-]hh:mm]
        参数:
        date - the date to format
        millis - true to include millis precision otherwise false
        tz - timezone to use for the formatting (GMT will produce 'Z')
        返回:
        the date formatted as yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss[.sss][Z|[+-]hh:mm]

      • parse

        public static java.util.Date parse(java.lang.String date,
                                   java.text.ParsePosition pos)
                            throws java.text.ParseException
        Parse a date from ISO-8601 formatted string. It expects a format [yyyy-MM-dd|yyyyMMdd][T(hh:mm[:ss[.sss]]|hhmm[ss[.sss]])]?[Z|[+-]hh:mm]]
        参数:
        date - ISO string to parse in the appropriate format.
        pos - The position to start parsing from, updated to where parsing stopped.
        返回:
        the parsed date
        抛出:
        java.text.ParseException - if the date is not in the appropriate format
